metadata.synopsis: Cyborgs and fashion surround a Los Angeles policeman (Olivier Gruner) on a manhunt in the year 2020.

reviews: If the film is little more than a rip-off of countless other great science-fiction and action films of the '80s, it's definitely one of the best.

The hyperactive pace, the imaginative (if not always polished) effects and especially the formidable action scenes certainly make this worth a peek, more so after midnight with pizza and beer in hand.
Claims that Nemesis is Albert Pyun's opus aren't exaggerated.
